snippet: Niagara Falls, N.Y., a city that has lost half its population, hoped to keep the attention of tourists after Nik Wallenda’s feat.

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and LIZ LEYDEN

lead_paragraph: Niagara Falls, N.Y., a city that has lost half its population, hoped to keep the attention of tourists after Nik Wallenda’s feat.

headline.seo: Nik Wallenda, Tightrope-Walking His Way Into the History Books
headline.main: After Niagara Falls Tightrope Walk, Hope for a Boost in Tourism
headline.print_headline: For Niagara Falls, a Hope for a Boost in Tourism After a Tightrope Walk
